alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Jo Daviess; Stephenson (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued April 17 at 3:00PM CDT until April 18 at 8:00AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 8 AM CDT TUESDAY... ...WIND ADVISORY WILL EXPIRE AT 3 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 28 expected. * WHERE...In Iowa, Buchanan, Delaware, Dubuque, Jones and Jackson Counties. In Illinois, Jo Daviess, Stephenson and Carroll Counties. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 8 AM CDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Be sure to cover or bring indoors any sensitive plants.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
